name: Imsomed
description:
Your only friend in this world is light. 

Find all the generators and power them up to stay alive.
Darkness slows you down and they will use that to get you.

While a WebGL build is available, I highly recommend downloading the .exe instead to get the best possible experience.  

This game was made during one weekend for Mini Jam 115: Noir!
Special thanks to niraami or helping out with coding!
